4_13KqD3BoaRMudEG5QU2fnGLkSVx8qDXKof.body:
What you are looking for is a program like https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Vanitygen

Don't use third party services to generate a vanity address as they are inherently insecure. You can make a websote the usual way and then change the keys to your vanity keys.

If you are going to use .bit it might just be better to use a brain wallet with a secure passphrase (use warpwallet as it is not viable to bruteforce) as then you can recover the keys if your harddrive fails/is stolen ect. Although the keys should be in a cryptographically secure place e.g. Encrypted harddrive, Truecrypt.

> [nofish](#comment_262_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): When 80% of limit reached you will be asked to increase. If you don't increase it you will keep seeding what you have, but your client won't accept any new update. Optional files is supported, eg.: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Gif7PqWTzVWDQ42Mo7np3zXmGAo3DXc7h has 1000+ videos, they only download if your client requests it.
